text:
"I truly appreciate the efficiency and professionalism of
the staff at DBS Century Square. Even during peak hours,
they manage the high traffic with grace and ensure that
every customer is well taken care of. Kudos to the team
for their outstanding service!"

I would like to thank the DBS team for reaching out and resolving the issue efficiently. Special thanks to Ms. Ban from the Century Square branch, who was patient, professional, and very helpful throughout the process. My account has now been successfully opened. I truly appreciate the assistance and follow-up. Thank you again for turning a frustrating experience into a positive one.

DBS Century Square is definitely the best branch i have visited. Kudos to the team for managing the crowd that forms as early as 830am. The staff is trying their best to handle difficult situation before the branch open and its not an easy feat. I would like to express my heartfelt appreciation to the team. They have done their best!

I would like to extend my sincere appreciation to Rukiah, Buay Chiew and Anita for their excellent service at the branch. Their professionalism, efficiency, and warm demeanor made my visit a pleasant experience. Thank you both for your outstanding support!

Efficient and responsive service from bank staff even its very crowded. Saw two officers  running behind the counter helping counters.
The queue is never ending since opening till I settle my banking issue. Point of contact staff working hard to clear the queue, some uncivilised customers raising voices acting like a monkey. Salute to the staff maintaining their professionalism responding to those hoohaa.
